new.title: God created the world
new.description: God created the world in six days. Everything was made by God through His word

new.title: Three hebrews
new.description: Three Jews had their faith tested when forced to worship the king's golden image. Unafraid they remained loyal to the God of heaven.

new.title: Noah builds an ark
new.description: God commands Noah to build an ark to save himself and his family and animals because God will destroy the earth by flood.

new.title: The great flood
new.description: God sends flood that covers the whole earth to destroy man. Noah and his family alone escaped the destruction.

new.title: Mount ararat
new.description: After floating on the water for 150 days, Noah's ark rested on the mountains of Ararat. Noah and his family and all the animals disembarked to live on the cleansed earth as the only survivors of the flood.

new.title: Rainbow
new.description: God sets a rainbow as a promise to the world that He will not destroy the earth by flood again.

names.title: Ascension
names.description: Jesus says farewell to his disciples before going back to heaven. He promises to be with them always.

names.title: House of prayer
names.description: Jesus gets angry at those selling outside the temple. He tells everyone that the temple if a house of prayer.

names.title: Noah builds an ark
names.description: God commands Noah to build an ark to save himself and his family and animals because God will destroy the earth by flood.

names.title: Mount ararat
names.description: After floating on the water for 150 days, Noah's ark rested on the mountains of Ararat. Noah and his family and all the animals disembarked to live on the cleansed earth as the only survivors of the flood.

names.title: Burning bush
names.description: God calls Moses out of a burning bush to commission him to lead Israelite slaves out of Egyptian bondage.

names.title: Baby in a basket
names.description: A mother's love leads her to hide her baby in a basket to protect him from being murdered by Egyptian soldiers.

names.title: Bitter water
names.description: God turns bitter water into sweet water for the thirsty children of Israel in the wilderness.

names.title: Jesus is baptized
names.description: John the Baptist baptizes Jesus and declares Him to be the Savior of the world, the Lamb of God that takes away the sin of the world.

names.title: Jesus teaches the beautitudes
names.description: Jesus teaches the beautitudes to the people who gathered around Him by a mountain.

names.title: Jesus feeds 5,000
names.description: Jesus feeds 5000 people by multiplying a few loaves of bread and fish in the wilderness.

names.title: Jesus is buried
names.description: Jesus is taken down from the cross and buried in a tomb.

names.title: River of blood
names.description: Moses turns water to blood to demonstrate God's power before Pharaoh.

names.title: Body and blood
names.description: Jesus spends his last night on earth before his death with his disciples. He explains the meaning of his sacrifice using bread and wine.

names.title: Crucifixion
names.description: Jesus is condemned to death by the religious and political leaders of his time by way of crucifixion.

names.title: Jesus dies on the cross
names.description: Jesus dies on the cross for the sins of the world.

names.title: Leper and centurion
names.description: Jesus heals two people one after another.

names.title: Money inside the fish
names.description: In order to pay for the temple tax, Jesus tells Peter to get a coin from the most unexpected places.

names.title: God created the world
names.description: God created the world in six days. Everyting was made by God through His word.

names.title: Gadarenes
names.description: Jesus drives out the demons of out a man who lived among the dead and sends them to the pigs.

names.title: Moses divides the sea
names.description: When it appears there is no way out, God makes a way for the children of Israel to escape from the Egyptian army.

names.title: Joseph and Mary escape to Egypt
names.description: Joseph is warned in a dream that King Herod is seeking to destroy baby Jesus. He is told to escape to Egypt with his wife Mary and their baby.

names.title: Jesus talks about the end of the world
names.description: Jesus predicts events that will lead to the end of the world.

names.title: Footwashing
names.description: Jesus washes the feet of His disciples setting an example of humility and what it means to be a leader.

names.title: Jesus is fasting in the wilderness
names.description: Jesus is tempted of Satan to sin after fasting for 40 days in the wilderness.

names.title: The great flood
names.description: God sends flood that covers the whole earth to destroy man. Noah and his family alone escaped the destruction.

names.title: I am
names.description: Jesus claims to be the great I AM.

names.title: Molten calf
names.description: Feeling that their leader has disappeared, the children of Israel made a golden calf to represent the God who led them out of bondage.

names.title: Fiery serpent
names.description: The children of Israel murmur against Moses for their hardship in the wilderness. God sends serpents as a punishment for their murmurings. But because they repented of their sins, God provide them with healing tthrough a metal serpent.

names.title: Jesus lost in jerusalem
names.description: Joseph and Mary take their 12 year old Jesus to Jerusalem.  Upon returning to their home, they had discovered that Jesus was not with their company of travelers. After three days, they found Him in the temple.

names.title: Lazarus
names.description: After four days of being dead, Jesus brings his dead friend back to life.

names.title: Lunatic
names.description: When the disciples could not heal the lunatic, the father came to Jesus for healing.

names.title: Samson kills a lion
names.description: Samson kills a lion and something sweet came out of it.

names.title: Ten Lepers
names.description: Jesus heals ten lepers but only one came back to thank Him.

names.title: Blind man healed with mud
names.description: Jesus uses mud to heal a blind man.

names.title: Cain and Abel
names.description: A man is jealous of his brother and kills him.

names.title: Giving
names.description: Jesus speaks highly of a poor widow who gave all that she had.

names.title: Manna
names.description: Without any food to eat in the wilderness, God rains food from heaven to feed the children of Israel.

names.title: Jesus is born
names.description: Jesus Christ, the long promised Messiah is born in a manger.

names.title: Nain
names.description: Jesus brought joy back to the mourning widow when he raised his dead son back to life.

names.title: Nobleman
names.description: Jesus heals a nobleman's son by just speaking the word.

names.title: Jesus talks about the prodigal son
names.description: Jesus tells a story of a father who has two sons. The younger son makes bad decisions that led him to discover his father's love.

names.title: Pilate
names.description: The religious leaders brings Jesus before Pilate demanding that He be executed.

names.title: Parables
names.description: Jesus teaches many parables to explain the kingdom of heaven to his followers.

names.title: Absalom
names.description: Absalom with his army fights his father David's army. His rebellious cause ends in tragic death that reveals his father's love for him.

names.title: Capernaum
names.description: Four friends break open the roof to let down their sick friend inside the house where Jesus was preaching so he could be healed.

names.title: Jesus is resurrected
names.description: Jesus comes back from the dead as He promised and as prophesied in the Scriptures.

names.title: Korah
names.description: Korah and his followers attempt to overthrow Moses as a leader but God shows who is the true leader.

names.title: Ten Commandments
names.description: God gives ten rules to Moses for the children of Israel.

names.title: Water from rock
names.description: Moses hits a rock and water gushes out to quench the thirst of the children of Israel.

names.title: Rainbow
names.description: God sets a rainbow as a promise to the world that He will not destroy the earth by flood again.

names.title: Good samaritan
names.description: A man is robbed and left to die. The most unexpected savior comes to his rescue.

names.title: Storm
names.description: Asleep on a boat, the disciples are left to battle against the storm. The disciples wake up Jesus to help them stay alive.

names.title: Sower
names.description: Jesus tells the parable of the sower to explain the different kinds of hearers of His word.

names.title: Zacchaeus
names.description: Jesus shows love to a despised rich man in the city of Jericho.

names.title: Three hebrews
names.description: Shadrach, Meshach and Abednego, Daniel's three friends are facing a test of faith.  Should they bow down before a golden image that Nebuchadnezzar has set up or be loyal to their God even unto death? This is a lesson for everyone whose faith in God are tested.

names.title: Abraham sacrifices Isaac
names.description: God tests Abraham's faith by asking him to offer his only son Isaac as a sacrifice

names.title: Babel
names.description: In a time when everyone spoke the same language, people worked together to build a very tall tower.

names.title: Jesus heals a man at Bethesda
names.description: Jesus heals a man who has been paralysed for 38 years on the Sabbath.

names.title: Sick woman and a dead daughter
names.description: Jesus heals a woman who has been sick for 12 years and a 12 year old girl.

names.title: Samson slays 1 thousand Philistines
names.description: Samson fights a thousand Philistines using only a jawbone.

names.title: Transfiguration
names.description: Jesus is transfigured on the mount and spends time with Moses and Elijah.

names.title: Gabriel talks to mary
names.description: Mary who is a virgin is visited by the angel Gabriel. The angel tells her that she will be pregnant through the Holy Spirit and will give birth to the Messiah.

names.title: Ten Virgins
names.description: Jesus tells a story of the ten virgins to explain the kingdom of heaven.

names.title: Jesus attends a wedding
names.description: Jesus performs His first miracle at a wedding in Cana.

names.title: Jesus walks on the water
names.description: Jesus walks on the water in the sea of Galilee.

names.title: Samaria
names.description: Jesus asks for water from a woman of Samaria. When she refused, Jesus offers her the living water.

names.title: Wise men visit baby Jesus
names.description: Wise men visited baby Jesus and are warned in a dream not to go back to Herod.
